name: rajat11
description:
Unfolding of a rajat11 sparse matrix into a lattice. The original matrix describes a circuit simulation problem first documented by Rajat in 2004. In this simulation, the matrix is represented as a lattice with 135 nodes which undergoes a process of unfolding until it reaches equilibrium. 

@lukapiskorec, mp4, 1000 x 1000 pix, 300 frames
